channel.title: wordpress on IT技术分享

item.title: wordpress更改IP
item.description: 修改wp-config.php define('WP_SITEURL', 'http://新的網址'); define('WP_HOME', 'http://新的網址'); UPDATE wp_options SET option_value = REPLACE(option_val

item.title: wordpress模板修改及函数说明
item.description: 找到路径wp-content/themes/你的模板/single.php 即是你的内容页(post)模板，修改即可。 =================================== WordPress基本

item.title: wordpress Cannot modify header information – headers already sent by
item.description: Cannot modify header information – headers already sent by xxxxx in /home/content/m/u/s/musiqcentral/html/wp-includes/pluggable.php on line 8xxx header.php 增加函数
